item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @SandScape SandScape
item.description:
@SandScape wrote:

go to client.java
search for code:int loadgame = loadgame(playerName, passHash(playerPass));
delete the playerhass from there.

it should look like this
code:int loadgame = loadgame(playerName,(playerPass));

then search for
code:[code]characterfile.write(passHash(playerPass), 0, passHash(playerPass)

[/code]

you should see this /* ACCOUNT */ characterfile.write("[ACCOUNT]", 0, 9); characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-username = ", 0, 21); characterfile.write(playerName, 0, playerName.length()); characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-password = ", 0, 21); characterfile.write(passHash(playerPass), 0, passHash(playerPass) .length()); characterfile.newLine();
then delete both passhash.and delete .length());

so the code should look like this when your done.

/* ACCOUNT */
characterfile.write("[ACCOUNT]", 0, 9);
characterfile.newLine();
characterfile.write("character-username = ", 0, 21);
characterfile.write(playerName, 0, playerName.length());
characterfile.newLine();
characterfile.write("character-password = ", 0, 21);
characterfile.write(passHash(playerPass);
characterfile.newLine();

hope i helped if you need more help ask!

Read full topic
